meta-review.comment: Black Myth Wukong roars into the action RPG arena with a thrilling blend of combat and mythic lore. This game is a celebration of classic Chinese mythology and offers players a captivating and challenging experience. From the breathtaking visuals to the intense boss battles, Black Myth Wukong shines as a must-play title for adventure seekers. Get ready to embark on an epic journey as you unleash the power of the legendary Monkey King!
